title: Screen does not move smoothly when the screen is not locked.
body:
Hey everyone, I just noticed forums was closed and only board is open so I am not really sure where I can post this for help so forgive me if it is the wrong place.

My screen movement is really off. Its all normal if I dont scroll up/down or sideways but when I, for example, Move my mouse down to move the screen down, it doesnt do it in a a fluent way like I see it happening with other players on twitch or how I remember it used to be before I had stopped playing for some time. If I change the sensitivity in options to be a little more or less, it still doesnt move smoothly like it should be, it kind of seems like its edgy when it moves. Its really hard to explain without showing a visual lol.  I am just wondering if anyone else having such issues. 
My settings is almost defualt other than a few button mapping, and video settings is set to 1920-1080p and borderless. Thank you all

replies.body:
Heya, the old forums were closed down a few years ago and transitioned over to these boards.  Welcome!  There could be some config mess up not responding to your input properly, let me know if a reset helps:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
